message: @Magazine3 mentioned image uploading in another thread
ok, I have two comments/ideas about images, first I think using other image upload sites is sufficient as long as the image is displayed inline in the thread like e.g. ualoo.com or tinypic.com
however it doesn't work for sites that do not have a direct image link that looks like one (e.g. any link with an amazon security key as parameter)
also, previewing twitpic urls would be nice it that is possible
It doesn't seem like they have a lot of tools for fighting off spammers right now. No email verification+image upload could turn into a huge pain if someone was... bored enough?
I run ualoo.com and am working on a special ualoo to integrate into convore.
